name: BATTLE ARENA
description:
Battle Arena is a frenetic action game , with bullets flying everywhere.
Destroy the maximum of robots you can , to get points and put your name in the ONLINE WORLD RANKING.



A unique 2D action game (side view) that has been influenced by the best games like Soldat, Broforce, Quake, Metal Slug, Counter-Strike and flash player action games, provides a fast-paced gaming experience with lots of bullets and explosions. Fight in this robotic apocalypse with an incredible arsenal of 12 weapons, knives and grenades.

In Battle Arena the best defense is attack! ricocheted bullets, cut them, use dash to get closer, are you ready for that?
